column4: hi im on 9.04 and ff3 suddenly shows only images, nothing written appears, just lines, whatz happening?
What's the output of "apt-cache policy firefox"?
(copy it to http://paste.ubuntu.com/, link the page it creates here)
http://paste.ubuntu.com/474265/
that's not the output of "apt-cache policy firefox"
yes it is i just run it as u said
so?
considering that it consists entirely of "http://paste.ubuntu.com/", I sincerely doubt it.
then it means it wouldnt even let me paste anthing

close any running copies of firefox, do "mv ~/.mozilla ~/mozilla-profile" in the terminal to move your Firefox profile out of the way (you can restore it later with "rm ~/.mozilla; mv ~/mozilla-profile ~/.mozilla"), then reopen and see if the problem still happens
kk right away
wait can u re-write it once more?
1) close firefox, 2) mv ~/.mozilla/ ~/mozilla-profile/ 3) start firefox
to undo (2) later, 1) rm -r ~/.mozilla/ 2) mv ~/mozilla-profile/ ~/.mozilla/
didnt solve the prob
have you manually installed any fonts to your computer recently?
i think so yes
according to people with similar issues on Ubuntu Forums, that can cause the problem. Try removing them again and see if it fixes it.
downloaded from dafont and copied into the fonts folder, they also worked
ok but how can i find those recently installed fonts? i mean its so many of em
Dr_Willis: so how do i unistall those fonts in order to have firefox working properly again and finally showing me all the writings?
